name: GH Actions Python Pytest 最小
description: Python + pytest の最小ワークフロー

files.template:
name: Pytest
on: [push]
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with: { python-version: '3.11' }
      - run: echo 'pytest -q'
